import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import Store from '../Redux/Store' import * as actions from '../Redux/Action/ProductAction' import ProductService from '../Service/ProductService' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' var mapStateToProps = state => { return { bidUserList: state.bidUserList, products: state.products } } class UserBids extends React.Component { render() { return <> {this.props.bidUserList.map((bid, index) => { return {this.props.products.map((product) => { if (bid.productId == product.productId) { return <> {this.props.categories.map((category) => { return category.categoryId == product.categoryId ? : "" })} } })} })}
Sl.no Product Name Product Description Measurement Product Quantity Images vendor Price bidded price bidded Stock bidded date bid status
{index + 1}{product.productName} {product.productDescription}{category.productMeasurement}{product.productStock} images {product.vendorPrice}{bid.bidPrice} {bid.bidStock} {bid.bidDate} {bid.bidStatus==1?<>
Congrats!!! Your bid has been accepted you can now proceed for payment
: (bid.bidStatus==0? : ) }
} } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(UserBids);
